metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4646 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: (1) unsquash-1.c, (2) unsquash-2.c, (3) unsquash-3.c, and (4) unsquash-4.c in Squashfs and sasquatch allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted input.

notes.Note: alexmurray> xenial got updated to 1:4.3-3ubuntu2.16.04.3 fixing this (LP: #1785499)

criterions.comment: squashfs-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
